## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media
features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use
of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may
combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve
collected from your use of their services.

function properly without these cookies.

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's
experience more efficient.  
  
The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly
necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we
need your permission.  
  
This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third
party services that appear on our pages.  
  
You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie
Declaration on our website.  
  
Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process
personal data in our Privacy Policy.  
  
Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your
consent.

**Do not sell or share my personal information**

# Agile  Consultancy

Whether you’re just getting started with your transformation, are considering
making major process changes, or have gone all-in on an Agile scaling
framework, our ****agile consultancy**** can help you overcome challenges and
support your needs as they grow.

Book a free consultation

Talk to us about your project __

## Wherever you are in your organisation's Agile journey, our team are here to
help.

From choosing the right tools and frameworks, to shifting your organisation’s
mindset ready to embrace major changes, there’s many layers to getting Agile
transformation right.

We can help you every step of the way- helping unlock innovation,
collaboration and efficiency, no matter the size of your business.

Get in touch today __

## The benefits of an Agile transformation

Agile transformations involve shifting an organisation to Agile ways of
working by applying Agile principles and frameworks.   This can bring several
key benefits to your organisation, including:

### Faster time to market

Improved communication, decision making and shared ownership

### High performing teams

Efficiently work at pace and adapt quickly to change

### More satisfied customers

Continuously improve on and deliver value for customers

### Engaged employees

Greater coordination and collaboration throughout the entire organisation

### Better return on investment

Deliver your organisation's IT and software projects faster and with better
predictability

### Complete transparency

Better visibility on performance and a clearer understanding and usage of
measurable data

## Bringing these Agile benefits … but at scale!

Many organisations have to some extent adopted an Agile way of working. But it
can be challenging implementing this at scale across the whole organisation,
with multiple teams, dependencies between them, different ways of working, and
a variety of different software tools.

But – if implemented successfully – the benefits of Agile can spread beyond
software and IT teams into the wider organisation.  

What is Agile at Scale? Read our blog __

## How we can help on your Agile journey

The benefits of Agile transformations are clear. However, these changes don’t
happen overnight, and large-scale transformations often have roadblocks, such
as resistance to change or adopting new systems of working.  

The good news is that Automation Consultants has considerable experience in
implementing agile transformations of various scales, and our team of Agile
specialists are here to help.

Whether you’re looking to adopt Agile across one team, many teams, or
throughout your whole organisation, we can help facilitate this change as
smoothly as possible.

Contact our Agile experts today for a free 30-minute consultation to discuss
your requirements.

Book a free consultation __

## Choosing the right process framework

Large Scale Scrum(LeSS), Disciplined Agile Delivery (DAD), Nexus and the
Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) are just a few of the most common Agile scaling
methodologies and frameworks.  

Each of the Agile frameworks set out their own prerequisites, processes,
tactics, implications, and more. As such, each framework has its own
advantages and limitations, and some will address your organisations
challenges better than others.

 As Agile experts, we can provide a solution that will best meet the
requirements of your organisation and provide the most value for your teams
and end users.  

Discuss your requirements __

## Is SAFe right for your organisation?

The Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) is probably the most popular Agile scaling
framework and is often considered the leading methodology to help large
organisations apply Agile practices.  

As businesses grow, SAFe provides a structured approach for scaling Agile. In
other words, SAFe can help promote alignment, collaboration, and delivery
across large numbers of Agile teams. SAFe practices are applied across the
whole organisation – from leadership to management and delivery teams.  

Discuss your requirements __

## Why choose us?

You may be weighing up your choices in Agile consultancy provider. Here's just
a few reasons why many of our customers choose Automation Consultants to
support their Agile journeys.

### A trusted Agile consultancy

We have knowledge and experience across a wide range of services, and we
deliver consistent, high-quality results across the whole development cycle.

### Honest, tailored advice

With Agile, there is no one-size-fits-all. Our certified consultants will
provide honest advice and guidance on the best approach and right choice of
tools to achieve your business goals.

### Atlassian Platinum Solution Partner

Our expertise with the Atlassian toolset will help ensure that your Agile
processes at every level of scale are well supported by software tools.

### Support a range of frameworks

We can help your organisation deploy Agile at Scale by providing consultancy
in SAFe and other leading Agile scaling frameworks.

## Getting started with Scaled Agile

Each agile journey is unique – and so your organisation’s Agile transformation
should be too. Automation Consultants’ Agile transformations are individually
tailored to meet your organisation’s set goals.  

Contact our Agile experts today

## Jira Align Services

Atlassian has developed Jira Align, the leading platform to support Agile at
Scale. Jira Align integrates with Jira and can support all leading Agile
scaling frameworks, including SAFe.  Jira Align can help your organisation
solve business agility challenges by connecting your business strategy to
technical execution and outcomes. Here are just some of the great benefits of
Jira Align:  

### Real time visibility

Visualise teams’ progress, status, and any red flags

### Align every team to strategy

Improve value delivery at every level – across programs, solutions, and
portfolio

### Flexible for any methodology

Supports any choice of framework, including custom or hybrid versions

####  **If you are ready to transform your Agile planning processes, get in
touch about our Jira Align implementation services. **

Find out more __

## Looking for expert guidance for your Agile journey? Talk to our team.

Looking to learn more about how we can help your organisation in all things
Agile? Book in your free 30-minute Agile consultation today.

Book your call __

Or, if you would like to get in touch with one of our Agile experts, without
necessarily scheduling a free consultation, please complete the form below and
we'll reach out to you shortly.

# Atlassian  Jira  pricing

  1. Home
  2. __Atlassian Products
  3. __Atlassian Jira pricing

Automation Consultants

Atlassian ProductsProducts

30 August 2019

As an Atlassian partner and a consultant to multiple large private and public
sector organisations around the UK, we understand the need to offer our
customers Jira pricing options, including the ability to pay using a purchase
order number, normal credit terms, or invoice.

Jira and the associated product range including Jira Software and Jira Service
Desk have traditionally been purchased directly from Atlassian by payment in
advance. These Jira licenses and software were most commonly paid for via
credit card – useful for teams that want to move forward quickly, with the
SaaS version of Jira to support issue tracking and project management.

However, where this isn’t possible, or when Jira is embraced throughout an
organisation and a larger order is required, it is a benefit to be able to buy
with purchase order, invoice and regular credit terms. Our Jira software
pricing and flexible methods of payment allow for company-wide roll out,
something which is a common occurrence, once one team proves successful.

With so many flexible payment options available and reasonable Atlassian Jira
pricing, your organisation could start reaping the benefits instantaneously.
Our experts can deploy your Jira licenses and provide expert knowledge and
training to support the smooth integration of the software.

Whether it’s 100 SaaS Jira users or 10,000 server based users, as an official
Jira partner you can purchase the licenses and applications through us, while
also benefiting from 15 years of software lifecycle knowledge, and project
management expertise.

If you’re looking for more information about Jira service desk pricing, or
would like to learn more about Jira cost savings for your business, contact us
today.

Click here to find out more about:

Jira – issue management application – server or web based  
Jira Software – formerly Jira Agile – agile Jira project management  
Jira Service Desk – for all your service desk agents – service desk

Talk to us today to discover how we can help you with your Jira pricing.
